>The third is a love story about Teruhime and Matsudaira Katamori.

Did someone say the magic words?? lol I SO have to get ahold of that when 
I'm in Japan in September!!

Speaking of which, for those of you who are interested, I'm ghostwriting a 
journal for Teruhime at www.greatestjournal.com/users/teru_chan . I figure 
it'll help if I write about my trip from outside my own point of view as 
well as my own point of view.

-M.
